name: börd
description:
As our first game project at school, we had to reproduce Flappy Bird and this is what it came out to be. We worked in pairs and most of the game's code is from me, but I had some help from Kultisti (https://kultisti.itch.io/), who was in charge of the graphics.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you want to play on browser, I recommend to turn it on full screen. There's also an option to download the .exe for windows.

You jump with LMB/space

Highscores save only your scores, not everyones who play the game.
